message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
I'll take 60% of the original amount. Is that fair?
That's a bit steep, Bob. I'd like to negotiate further.
I'll take 55% of the remaining amount. Can you meet me in the middle?
I'll compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you give me the majority?
I'm not willing to give you the majority, Bob. I think 55% was a fair offer earlier.
I'll take 60% of the remaining amount. This is my final offer.
I'll give you a slight edge, but I still want a decent share. Will you accept?
I was hoping for a bit more, Bob. I'm not willing to settle for 52%.
I'll take 70% of the remaining amount. This is my final offer, Bob.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. Will you meet me in the middle?
Alright, Bob. I'll meet you in the middle. 48% is better than 45%.
